rubygem.name: congress
rubygem.info: Ruby wrapper for the Real-Time Congress API. The Real-Time Congress API is a RESTful API over the artifacts of Congress, in as close to real-time as possible.

rubygem.name: tradehill
rubygem.info: Ruby wrapper for the TradeHill API. TradeHill allows you to trade US Dollars (USD) for Bitcoins (BTC) or Bitcoins for US Dollars.

rubygem.name: mtgox
rubygem.info: Ruby wrapper for the Mt. Gox Trade API. Mt. Gox allows you to trade US Dollars (USD) for Bitcoins (BTC) or Bitcoins for US Dollars.

rubygem.name: gems
rubygem.info: Ruby wrapper for the RubyGems.org API

rubygem.name: futures_pipeline
rubygem.info: Ruby wrapper for the Futures, Inc. US Military Pipeline API

rubygem.name: multi_json
rubygem.info: A gem to provide swappable JSON backends utilizing Yajl::Ruby, the JSON gem, JSON pure, or a vendored version of okjson.
rubygem.authors: Michael Bleigh, Josh Kalderimis, Erik Michaels-Ober

rubygem.name: oa-more
rubygem.info: Additional strategies for OmniAuth.

rubygem.name: oa-openid
rubygem.info: OpenID strategies for OmniAuth.

rubygem.name: oa-enterprise
rubygem.info: Enterprise strategies for OmniAuth.
rubygem.authors: James A. Rosen, Ping Yu, Michael Bleigh, Erik Michaels-Ober

rubygem.name: oa-basic
rubygem.info: HTTP Basic strategies for OmniAuth.

rubygem.name: oa-core
rubygem.info: Core strategies for OmniAuth.

rubygem.name: oa-oauth
rubygem.info: OAuth strategies for OmniAuth.

rubygem.name: omniauth
rubygem.info: OmniAuth is an authentication framework that that separates the concept of authentiation from the concept of identity, providing simple hooks for any application to have one or multiple authentication providers for a user.

rubygem.name: oauth2
rubygem.info: A Ruby wrapper for the OAuth 2.0 protocol built with a similar style to the original OAuth gem.

rubygem.name: t
rubygem.info: A Ruby wrapper for the Twitter REST and Search APIs
rubygem.authors: John Nunemaker, Wynn Netherland, Erik Michaels-Ober, Steve Richert

rubygem.name: octokit
rubygem.info: Simple wrapper for the GitHub API v2
rubygem.authors: Wynn Netherland, Adam Stacoviak, Erik Michaels-Ober

rubygem.name: rails_admin
rubygem.info: This rubygem does not have a description or summary.

rubygem.name: rails-admin
rubygem.info: This rubygem does not have a description or summary.

rubygem.name: thor
rubygem.info: A scripting framework that replaces rake, sake and rubigen

rubygem.name: simple_oauth
rubygem.info: Simply builds and verifies OAuth headers

rubygem.name: open311
rubygem.info: A Ruby wrapper for the Open311 API v2.

rubygem.name: faraday
rubygem.info: HTTP/REST API client library.

rubygem.name: multi_xml
rubygem.info: A gem to provide swappable XML backends utilizing LibXML, Nokogiri, or REXML.

rubygem.name: faraday_middleware
rubygem.info: Various middleware for Faraday

rubygem.name: twitter
rubygem.info: A Ruby wrapper for the Twitter REST and Search APIs
rubygem.authors: John Nunemaker, Wynn Netherland, Erik Michaels-Ober, Steve Richert

rubygem.name: racket
rubygem.info: Listen to your app.

rubygem.name: merb-admin
rubygem.info: MerbAdmin is a Merb plugin that provides an easy-to-use interface for managing your data

rubygem.name: linkedin
rubygem.info: Ruby wrapper for the LinkedIn API

rubygem.name: mlb
rubygem.info: MLB.rb is a Ruby library for retrieving current Major League Baseball players, managers, teams, divisions, and leagues.
